name: histology mnist csv overview
full_name: h2 Overview h1 Show the first 10 pixels h1 Preview all the data h1 Comparing Models
description: OverviewHere we show how to load process and classify the CSV style data and test out a few simple models Show the first 10 pixelsHere we show the distribution of the first 10 pixels for the smallest dataset 8x8 Preview all the dataHere we show all of the data and break it down by group. Comparing ModelsWe look at a number of different standard models for classifying the tiles KNearestNeighbors LogisticRegression RandomForest These give us a baseline for what we expect models to be able to do with these images a few utility functions for showing MNIST style images easily. We can see the lowest resolution are probably far too small to interpret meaningfully.
script: sklearn.metrics glob KNeighborsClassifier guess_image_dim seaborn numpy show_data_as_vec sklearn.ensemble show_data_as_images montage sklearn.model_selection confusion_matrix RandomForestClassifier matplotlib.pyplot pandas LogisticRegression accuracy_score sklearn.neighbors sklearn.linear_model evaluate_models train_test_split skimage.util
